text: Shin Saimdang (; , 29 October 1504 â€“ 17 May 1551) or Lady Saimdang Shin (, ) was an artist, poet, writer, and Confucian scholar during the Joseon dynasty of Korea. long time aged she was worship, honored as a symbol of wise mother and wife. Her real name was Inseon. Her pen names were Saimdang, Inimdang, Imdang, Imsajae.
